meanings.definition: plants that are adapted to survive in cold environments
meanings.sent1: The cryophytes in the Arctic have special features to withstand the freezing temperatures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cryophytes to understand how they can grow in such harsh conditions.
meanings.sent3: The cryophytes in Antarctica must be the coolest plants on Earth!
meanings.sent4: In the icy tundra, cryophytes are like nature's frozen warriors, standing strong against the cold.
meanings.sent5: The cryophytes shimmer like emerald jewels in the snow-covered landscape.

meanings.definition: organisms that thrive in icy conditions
meanings.sent1: Explorers discovered unique cryophytes living deep beneath the ice of the glacier.
meanings.sent2: The cryophytes near the polar regions have adapted to the extreme cold.
meanings.sent3: The cryophytes at the North Pole must throw the best ice parties!
meanings.sent4: In the frozen wilderness, cryophytes are the champions of survival, embracing the cold.
meanings.sent5: The cryophytes dance gracefully in the frosty winds, celebrating their icy home.
